input_args.text: 'Project Veritas: Scott Foval Reveals Who Was Really Behind the Romney 47% Video   Tweet \nIn this video, Scott Foval, the now former Field Director of Americans United For Change admits that the bartender who supposedly filmed Mitt Romney’s notorious 47% moment was not a bartender, but was a lawyer. “The lawyer took his phone and had the bartender walk around with it and set it up.”–Scott Foval'
